short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps Facebook on Facebook.com.  When you log out, Facebook cookies are killed so that you aren't tracked as you traverse the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a dedicated button to Chrome that when pressed logs you out and removes all of your Facebook (facebook.com) cookies.

As always, I'm excited to hear your feature suggestions or address any bugs found.

Last updated: January 2024
